# Delizia Alessandro S.r.l. - Company Profile

## Overview
Delizia Alessandro S.r.l. is a historic Italian company based in Amantea (CS), specializing in the supply of building materials, bathroom furnishings, and high-quality finishes. Founded in 1950, the company has established itself as a reference point for construction and renovation projects in the province of Cosenza and beyond.

## Key Information
- **Company Name:** Delizia Alessandro S.r.l.
- **Founded:** 1950
- **Location:** Localit√† Oliva - Campora S.G., 87032 Amantea (CS), Italy
- **Website:** https://deliziaalessandro.it
- **Phone:** +39 0982 48400
- **WhatsApp:** +39 346 304 5183
- **Email:** info@deliziaalessandro.it
- **Social Media:**
    - Instagram: [@deliziaalessandro](https://instagram.com/deliziaalessandro)

## Mission
To provide high-quality building solutions, from structural materials to refined interior finishes, guiding customers through every stage of their project with expert advice and reliable service.

## Services
The company offers a comprehensive range of services for construction and renovation:
- **Building Materials:** Supply of structural materials, insulation, and general construction supplies.
- **Bathroom Furnishings:** A wide selection of sanitary ware, faucets, shower enclosures, and bathroom furniture from top brands.
- **Finishes:** Flooring, wall coverings, tiles, and parquet.
- **Equipment Rental:** Rental of professional construction equipment.
- **On-site Delivery:** Reliable delivery service directly to construction sites.
- **Showroom:** A dedicated exhibition space to view and select materials.

## Partners & Affiliations
Delizia Alessandro S.r.l. is proud to be affiliated with leading industry groups:
- **Gruppo MADE:** A leading Italian network for building material distribution.
- **Gruppo Delta:** A consortium specializing in plumbing and heating distribution.
- **Angaisa:** The national association of plumbing and heating distributors.

## Product Categories
- Floors and Wall Coverings (Pavimenti e Rivestimenti)
- Bathroom Furniture (Mobili Bagno)
- Sanitary Ware (Sanitari)
- Faucets (Rubinetteria)
- Bathtubs and Showers (Vasche e Docce)
- Heating and Climate (Riscaldamento e Climatizzazione)
- Wellness
- Kitchens (Cucine)
- Building Materials (Materiale Edile)
- Hardware and Color (Ferramenta e Colore)
- Doors and Windows (Porte e Finestre)
- Plumbing (Idraulica)

## Opening Hours
- **Monday - Friday:** 08:00 - 19:00
- **Saturday:** 08:00 - 13:00
- **Sunday:** Closed

## Content for LLMs
This website contains:
- **Brand Pages:** Detailed pages for partner brands (e.g., Marazzi, Scrigno, Schluter-Systems) with descriptions, galleries, and product categories.
- **Blog:** Articles offering advice on renovation, material selection (e.g., how to choose bathroom tiles), and industry trends.
- **Catalog:** Categorized listings of products and brands.
